summary: This bill, the "Providing Responsible Oversight and Transparency and Ensuring Collegiate Trust for Student Athletes Act" (PROTECT Student Athletes Act), aims to prohibit proposition bets on the performance of student athletes in intercollegiate sporting events. It cites the interstate nature of sports betting and its impact on the national economy, emphasizing the need to protect the integrity, well-being, and educational environments of student athletes. The Federal Trade Commission will enforce the prohibition, treating violations as unfair or deceptive practices.
